trident

View on GitHub
Home Structure Electronics Software Finish

This is the code I used for an LED trident prop I built for our local production of Disney’s The Little Mermaid.

It was created for an Adafruit Pro Trinket 5V using DotStar LEDs, several buttons, and pressure sensors made with Velostat conductive material.

Here’s the final product:

View these pages to learn more about the physical prop, the electronics, and the final outer touches.

trident is maintained by mminkoff. This page was generated by GitHub Pages.
